## Paper review

### general review papers

#### [Huson 2011]()

- A survey of combinatorial methods for phylogenetic networks. *Huson and Scornavacca, Genome Biol. Evol.2011*. 
- Paper: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3017387/pdf/evq077.pdf
- Note: [link](Huson2011paper.html)

#### [David A.Morrison 2014]()

- Phylogenetic networks: a review of methods to display evolutionary history *David A.Morrison, Annual Research and Review in Biology, 2014*
- Paper: http://www.journalrepository.org/media/journals/ARRB_32/2014/Jan/Morrison4102013ARRB8230_1.pdf
- Note: [link](morrison2014paper.html)

### Identify recombination

#### [Average PAC likelihood using SNPs]()

- Modeling linkage disequilibrium and identifying recombination hotspots using single-nucleotide polymorphism data.  *Genetics 165.4 (2003): 2213-2233.Na Li and Matthew Stephens.*.
- Paper: http://www.genetics.org/content/genetics/165/4/2213.full.pdf 
- Note: [link](PAC.html)

#### [Integrative Software RDP]()

- RDP4: Detection and analysis of recombination patterns in virus genomes * Virus Evolution, 1(1),(2015)Martin, D. P., Murrell, B., Golden, M., Khoosal, A., & Muhire, B.*
- Paper: https://academic.oup.com/ve/article/1/1/vev003/2568683
- Software: http://web.cbio.uct.ac.za/~darren/RDP4Manual.pdf
- Note: [link](RDP4.html)


### Phylogenetic Network construction

#### [Algorithm from a given MUL tree]()

- Reconstructing the evolutionary history of polyploid from multilabeled trees. *Huber, Katharina T, et al. Molecular Biology and Evolution 23.9 (2006): 1784-1791.*
- Paper: https://academic.oup.com/mbe/article/23/9/1784/1014292 
- Note: [link](MUL.html)

#### [Joint Baysian Estimation of Alignment and Phylogeny]()

- Joint Bayesian estimation of alignment and phylogeny. *Redelings, Benjamin D., and Marc A. Suchard. Systematic biology 54.3 (2005): 401-418.*
- Paper: https://academic.oup.com/sysbio/article/54/3/401/1727336 
- Note: [link](jointestimation.html)
